flawed_nl_solution:
Area of 1 bedroom = 11 * 11 = <<11*11=121>>121 square feet
Area of 4 bedrooms = 121 * 4 = <<121*4=484>>484 square feet
Area of 1 bathroom = 6 * 8 = <<6*8=84>>84 square feet
Area of 2 bathrooms = 2 * 84 = <<2*84=168>>168 square feet
Area of all bedrooms and bathrooms = 484 + 168 = <<484+168=652>>652 square feet
Kitchen + living room = 1110 - 652 = <<1110-652=458>>458
Kitchen = 458/2 = <<458/2=229>>229
#### 229

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 48, not 84. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
